### Exploring correlated measurements
```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(GGally)
library(here)

OurData <- read_delim(here("Data", "tidy_exam_data.txt"))

multiple_correlations_plot <- ggpairs(OurData[c("BMI", 
                    "Age", 
                    "Education", 
                    "GA.at.outcome", 
                    "Birthweight",
                    "IL6_baseline",
                    "IL8_baseline")])

multiple_correlations_plot
```
